html: While this memo raises serious concerns with the FISA process, I have been and remain confident in the overwhelming majority of the men and women serving at the FBI and DOJ.

html: It is important for the American public to know if the dossier was paid for by another candidate, used in court pleadings, vetted before it was used, vetted after it was used, and whether all relevant facts were shared with the tribunal approving of the FISA application.

html: Good luck explaining why new citizens should follow the law when those in power do not.
text: Good luck explaining why new citizens should follow the law when those in power do not.

html: The law is referenced five separate times in the oath of citizenship we require new citizens to take.
text: The law is referenced five separate times in the oath of citizenship we require new citizens to take.

html: When the law is abandoned, it is weakened in the eyes of those we expect to follow it.
text: When the law is abandoned, it is weakened in the eyes of those we expect to follow it.

html: Once you decide some laws are worth enforcing and some are not, you have weakened the law – forever.
text: Once you decide some laws are worth enforcing and some are not, you have weakened the law – forever.

html: We symbolize our devotion to the equal application of the law with a blindfolded woman holding a set of scales and a sword.
text: We symbolize our devotion to the equal application of the law with a blindfolded woman holding a set of scales and a sword.

html: The law not only binds us together, it embodies the virtues we cherish: justice, mercy, equality, and fairness.
text: The law not only binds us together, it embodies the virtues we cherish: justice, mercy, equality, and fairness.

html: For too long, Congress has let the Executive Branch engage in constitutional adverse possession.
text: For too long, Congress has let the Executive Branch engage in constitutional adverse possession.

html: While today you may benefit from the non-enforcement of the law, tomorrow will be different.
text: While today you may benefit from the non-enforcement of the law, tomorrow will be different.

html: One person does not make law in our republic.
text: One person does not make law in our republic.

html: Attempts to undermine the law, regardless of motivation, are detrimental to the republic.
text: Attempts to undermine the law, regardless of motivation, are detrimental to the republic.

html: The law makes the rich respect the poor. It allows the powerless to challenge the powerful.
text: The law makes the rich respect the poor. It allows the powerless to challenge the powerful.

html: The law is the thread that holds the tapestry of our country together. It is the most unifying, equalizing force we have.
text: The law is the thread that holds the tapestry of our country together. It is the most unifying, equalizing force we have.

html: We make law with the expectation the law will be respected, enforced and executed.
text: We make law with the expectation the law will be respected, enforced and executed.

html: The law is the reason the legislative branch exists. We do not exist to pass ideas or make suggestions - we make law.
